original_text: And the children of Israel did evil in the sight of the Lord, and forgat the Lord their God, and served Baalim and the groves.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와의 목전에 악을 행하여 자기들의 하나님 여호와를 잊어버리고 바알들과 아세라들을 섬긴지라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel did evil
in the sight of the Lord
and forgat the Lord their God
and served Baalim and the groves
